mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gallery ( no, user_no, content, filepath, orgname, savename, filesize ) values ( seq_gallery_no.nextval , #{userNo}, #{content}, #{filePath}, #{orgName}, #{saveName}, #{fileSize} )
mapper.select: select a.no, a.user_no, a.content, a.filepath, a.orgname, a.savename, a.filesize, b.name from gallery a join users b on a.user_no=b.no
